languages.text: [draft]The Psyker creates a 3×3 telekinetic dome on the battlefield until the end of combat or until the Psyker selects another area for the Telekinetic Dome. Anyone shooting at the targets inside the telekinetic dome from the outside, has a chance to miss as if the targets were in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g}. This chance does not stack with defense from covers and counts as half cover for all effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [draft]The Psyker creates a 3×3 telekinetic dome on the battlefield until the end of combat or until the Psyker selects another area for the Telekinetic Dome. Anyone shooting at the targets inside the telekinetic dome from the outside, has a chance to miss as if the targets were in a half cover. This chance does not stack with defense from covers and counts as half cover for all effects and abilities.
